arn.description: ARN of the Dedicated IP Pool.

poolName.description:
Name of the dedicated IP pool.

The following arguments are optional:

scalingMode.description: IP pool scaling mode. Valid values: `STANDARD`, `MANAGED`. If omitted, the AWS API will default to a standard pool.

tags.description: A map of tags to assign to the pool. If configured with a provider `default_tags` configuration block present, tags with matching keys will overwrite those defined at the provider-level.

stateInputs.description: Input properties used for looking up and filtering DedicatedIpPool resources.
